Link Validation Helper

Source: R/UrlScraper_utils_html.R
check_links.Rd

Evaluates extracted URLs and determines which of them should be retained for further processing. The function filters out links that:

  • Do not belong to the same domain as baseurl

  • Point to files such as images, audio, video, archives, executables, etc.

  • Refer to fragments or anchor points

  • Refer back to the same path as the main page

Usage

check_links(hrefs, baseurl)

Arguments

hrefs

Character vector of URLs to check.

baseurl

Character string giving the original page URL for domain and path comparison.

Value

A logical vector indicating which entries in hrefs should be retained.

On this page
